commitmsg: verify that you can still put the metadata in a variable, if you wish
add more tests to verify the behavior of the metadata parser
new metadata format
single file plugins should not register any stylesheets
CSS is now registered with Tiki

a simplification. work under the assumption that you're only changing
a single plugin, so that's the only bit that needs refreshed metadata
can now generate metadata required to reload a plugin

better use of plugin path by maintaining plugin locations. This makes it so
that the server doesn't need to hunt through the whole path for each file.
rename package->index, which is the new name for the top of a package
Added tag 0.5.1 for changeset 984a7bbb7533

fix the pavement so that database creation does all of the required steps
and is run separately from the initial install (which fails because the
required libraries are not available...)
use info() rather than print (because it's squelchable)
Populate devdata.db with the initial schema in development mode, not just in production mode

get auth cookie working properly in development with the new server
setup

make script lookup work for user-installed plugins
simplified calling to the plugin catalog
plugins can be registered in the user's editable space
add support for user plugins in BespinSettings/plugins/
single file plugins are actually masquerading as packages.
need to store the metadata in a variable for this to be legal JS
improve the error message for missing metadata in a single file plugin
support for single file plugins
refactoring for the next round of plugin handling
pass plugin metadata back to the client

controller side is now fleshed out for presenting tiki with the
default plugin set
container object for plugin metadata
changing ignores, based on what's actually needed now as well

fix tests based on current repository layout/feature set (actually just
deleting two no-longer-relevant tests)

revert 0e91d59724ac, because it's not required with a little bit of
configuration magic in SC.

set up pathpopper middleware, which is useful for running behind the
SproutCore server
narwhal moves into the bespinclient directory
switching over to the main Narwhal repository
start jack as part of paver start
fix the server URL
additional setup
add URLRelay compatible proxy
adding some initial hooks to the JavaScript

initial commit of bespin python server that is separate from the bespin
client code
bugfix: typo in the group remove controller.
Small tweaks: enabled collab, removed some debugging.
Never raise errors if dependencies can't be found in a batch of metadata, since this prevents user plugins from depending on built-in plugins
Implement user worker plugins on the server side
Replace references to themes with references to plugins in bespin/usertemplate/plugins/README.txt
Added tag 0.8 for changeset 96bca5879540
make the raising of plugin dependency errors optional

fix bug 543442: internal server error when you try to delete a directory
without providing a trailing slash (now gives a 400 error)
delete dead code
guard against invalid dependencies in filter_plugins

fix regression from 3e704f5b2c43 in reload functionality
(the reload URL is only intended to return metadata from a single
plugin, so it can't have filtering applied to it properly)
Deliver to web workers only the plugins that are safe for them to execute
eventlog details can be unbounded length

handle new htmlt plugins (as a replacement for jsmt)

--HG--
rename : bespin/tests/plugindir/plugin1/templates/one.jsmt => bespin/tests/plugindir/plugin1/templates/one.htmlt
Create a BespinSettings project if it doesn't exist while fetching a template
fix base url for new, simpler server setup

optimization for template modules: eliminate render() and just mix the
templates into the exports object

the server will now serve up templates for a plugin automatically in
a synthesized module

add support for "boot" plugins. these plugins are loaded specially
and are not included in the main metadata

remove error logging from _check_identifiers so that errorstack isn't
flooded with useless info
add missing "self." so that queued jobs can be completed properly
Update metadata to the format expected by the new Tiki
Added tag 0.7.3 for changeset e7e0348ed6df
remove unwanted license text from email messages
turn off noisy csrf logging
Use preview/at/ to get css files; bug 561070
Saveas shouldn't work when saving to a folder and there is some content; bug 558670

a better fix for ensuring that *only* user plugins can be uploaded to the
gallery
add new thirdparty directory to the pluginpath

fix bug 558310: tweak handling of URLs and plugin names to allow remote
installation again

fix bug 558349: users should not be able to upload plugins with the same
names as supported plugins.

fix bug in code that generates events for the social bar. could get
an error when opening file if there are no followers.
fix bug 558778: reduce CSRF logging level to make ErrorStack usable.
Refactored parts of callab, added "tell about file events", added notifications on opening files.

Added public user data method.

--HG--
extra : rebase_source : 8effde8327f9c986017a16850dfd819b936fcd5c

First round of social interaction commands.

--HG--
extra : rebase_source : 00a48f6fb18df3bfda6ad835885b095895d9b450
Add error messages if the users tries to add a plugin that does not exist
Append the request /plugin/request/user to send back the user's pluginorder as well as the deactivated plugins

you can now log in by email address, as long as there is only one
user with the email address given
fix bug 558311: integrate ErrorStack on the server

fix a bug in config test (triggered by the removal of collab as a capability
on the server)
save version number when a new version is uploaded
fix bug 552670: python build was not correctly setting up package list

temporarily turn off collab on the server (prevents the server from
sending mobwrite messages)

revert the list_all behavior back to just returning a list of the filenames
rather than a list of objects

--HG--
extra : rebase_source : 19598af5f4b3f8e22e7502a0ccfd63808a38cf64
Unbreaking mobwrite.

Updating mobwrite with user names.

--HG--
extra : rebase_source : dde2c911fcc57b208144df520741b95a55e885fd

Patch #2 (intermediate). Full social features (need more extensive testing), integration with mobwrite (need more testing and we need to verify the functionality).

--HG--
extra : rebase_source : 6d0a35cf1d48fa1a00832b428fd13338087bcfbf

Integrating mobwrite in the message loop.

--HG--
extra : rebase_source : 1842a5ed0c587e107611d3351f58e70f3dc25c1f

Making sure that the collaboration test works as expected: follow, unfollow, and broadcast.

--HG--
extra : rebase_source : 379272de5ef3d1a56747945501db64f303192622

Collaboration patch #1.

--HG--
extra : rebase_source : 614f412af96c31740b98f118a1d577de2563eeb4
add a URL that can be used to download the current version of a plugin

pass the proper format metadata back to the client when the user installs
a plugin
multifile plugins in the gallery are now stored in zip format
better error message for metadata validation fail in plugin upload
add devfiles to the hgignore

name is now derived from the plugin filename/directory name

--HG--
rename : bespin/tests/plugindir/SingleFilePlugin1.js => bespin/tests/plugindir/single_file_plugin1.js
rename : bespin/tests/plugindir/SingleFilePlugin2.js => bespin/tests/plugindir/single_file_plugin2.js
rename : bespin/tests/plugindir/SingleFilePlugin3.js => bespin/tests/plugindir/single_file_plugin3.js

plugin installation from the gallery returns the metadata of the
installed plugins
plugin installation handles dependencies

install from gallery partly implemented (not enough tests, no dependency
handling)

add server side for /plugin/gallery/

change packageInfo to package_info to better fit the PEP8 standard

add checks for plugin security (based on ownership) and already existing
versions
Can now "upload" a plugin (which actually just copies it to the right place)

start adding plugin gallery infrastructure, including Gallery database table
and validation for plugin metadata for plugins that are going into the
gallery

use the new package.json format for plugins

--HG--
rename : bespin/tests/plugindir/plugin1/plugin.json => bespin/tests/plugindir/plugin1/package.json
rename : bespin/tests/plugindir/plugin2/plugin.json => bespin/tests/plugindir/plugin2/package.json
rename : bespin/tests/plugindir/plugin3/plugin.json => bespin/tests/plugindir/plugin3/package.json

serve up version stamped CSS files to avoid overcaching in development
and permit the right amount of caching in production
remove extra / from quickopen output

set the version number of newly created databases to the latest repository
version
exclude SQLAlchemy 0.6, which requires some code upgrades

fix variable-rename induced bug (yay tests). also update the list_all
test to match the new format

updating list_all to use new JSON format

--HG--
extra : rebase_source : 21755f060234aca81118f7310adeb9455f2ec392

log file saves (to keep track of active daily users and length of time
in use)

add the upgrade task to the pavement and fix a bug in the migration for
the eventlog table

adds the eventlog table to the database, and the first couple of actions
we gather stats on:

1. new user registrations
2. number of user plugins

changes to package up for server installation
bug 550292
add the editbespin task in to allow editing bespin with bespin on localhost.

list_all is now supported at the root (let's hope no one has *too* many
files!). Also the result is now relative to the path that is passed in.
list_all now supports subtrees
provide the location of user plugins for the client side to use
adds support for importing plugins in tarballs and zipfiles
add support for installation of single file plugins

strip leading slashes from plugin locations
put the user added plugins before the other user plugins

support for individual plugins on the plugin path (so that a user can
add individual plugins)
fix Python 2.6 and accidental license application errors in tests
remove license header that broke this config file
apply the tri-license header to the files
rename bespinbuild->dryice
removing the extraneous bespin- from directory names
set plugin resource URLs appropriately for our server environment
pull the basic plugin metadata handling out into bespinbuild

server base URL needs to be set appropriately depending on whether or
not it's running behind Abbot
static dir updates for rubyless server setup
get rid of dead code

plugins can be reloaded, even if the user is not authenticated. However,
if the plugin is a "user plugin" it obviously can't be reloaded without
auth.
provide infrastructure for the development setup to load test plugins
add reload URL to the metadata
only add errors to the metadata when there are errors
report errors in plugins back to the client
URL needs a leading slash, since it does not include the base
server now provides plugin metadata in JSON rather than as a script
bugfix: typo in the group remove controller.
Small tweaks: enabled collab, removed some debugging.
Never raise errors if dependencies can't be found in a batch of metadata, since this prevents user plugins from depending on built-in plugins
Implement user worker plugins on the server side
